description.db:para: This table is used by the Call Center module to store the definition of the agents serving the flows/queues. More information can be found at: &Marina.Rodeo_MOD_DOC;call_center.html.

column.name: agentid
column.description: The unique ID of the agent in the Call Center module - to be used to identify the agent in the module and from outside the module; It is an alphanumerical string.

column.name: location
logstate
msrp_location
msrp_max_sessions
column.description: How many MSRP/chat sessions the agent can handle in the same time.

column.name: skills
column.description: Comma separated list of skills offered by the agent; these skills must match the skills used in the queues/flows definition; In order to receive calls from a flow, the agent must have the skill required by that flow.

column.name: wrapup_end_time
column.description: The timestamp when the last wrapup ends/ended for the agent. If different than 0, the agent will only receive calls after this timestamp.

column.name: wrapup_time
column.description: The duration in seconds needed by the agent to wrap up the call he just completed. If set to 0, the global wraptup time will be used for this agent.
